website_summaries.verdict: A well-made lace front costume wig that looks full and hangs nicely, even straight out of the box.
pros: We love the striking two-tone silver-gray color that suits a range of fantasy characters
Users tend to praise its quality and versatility
Easy to heat style up to temperatures of 320°F
cons: No comb at back of wig

customer_reviews.title: beautiful and easy to style
customer_reviews.text: I'm obsessed! It's very thick, beautiful and easy to style. It's pretty shiney so I put a little baby powder on it so it would look more natural. It does tangle easily but if you're willing to maintain it then it is worth every penny. I've been getting compliments galore.
customer_reviews.author: Haley Michael

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised.
customer_reviews.text: Got it next day, fits beautifully, brushes nicely and came hair cap. It looks great and will definitely be wearing it for my halloween costume!
customer_reviews.author: samanthamylee

customer_reviews.title: Love this hair
customer_reviews.text: Love this hair!!! It's really thick but a little trim to add more layers evens it out! I sleep in my wig sooo it's a little maintenance but everyone loves it! Almost been a month wearing it daily! Will definitely buy again...if I even have to! Worth the buy!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: In LOVE
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and true to picture! Its super soft and they had great costumer service! The only thing is that my head is on the larger side so it was a bit of a tight squeeze to get it on but other than that I would definitely buy from them again!
customer_reviews.author: erika galloza

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for price
customer_reviews.text: Hair is good quality for the price!! Feels nice and easy to wear!! So beautiful!! Will order again! Top is shiny but that's an easy fix with dry shampoo:) very little shedding. Love love it
customer_reviews.author: Katiya

customer_reviews.title: I'm a guy and it transformed me!
customer_reviews.text: Loved it! I'm a guy and did a transformation video and it turned out well! Looks and feels amazing
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Overall I thought the wig was quite beautiful. Even went ahead and started preparing it by ...
customer_reviews.text: Overall I thought the wig was quite beautiful. Even went ahead and started preparing it by cutting down the lace. Afterwards I noticed all the short little hairs on the top. I'm a bit disappointed in this product, especially after reading all the great reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Katie PW

customer_reviews.title: Love love LOVE it!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this wig!! Ithe is my first wig, so I dont have a while lot to compare it to, but I can't imagine a better wig for the price. The top was a little flat and shiny when I got it, but that was easily fixed :) It shipped out within a couple hours and I got it super fast! I'm definitely buying more wigs from here!!
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: Great Wig!!
customer_reviews.text: Let me start by saying that I am usually a bit weary when buying wigs online but I was greatly surprised with this one. It is full and the length is amazing. It's hardly sheds at all and after adding a bit of baby powder to the black part of the ombré the wigs looks natural. If fits great, has minimum tangling and is soft and flows. I would recommend this wig to anyone!!!
customer_reviews.author: PHbb

customer_reviews.title: Love this wig!
customer_reviews.text: This wig is great! I did cut it into a bob but i overall love it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Howard

customer_reviews.title: This hair line😍 on a synthetic?!
customer_reviews.text: Ok so most synthetic wigs usually have a very bulky hairline that you can't trim around the ears because the wefts are sown into the cap there (you girls know what I'm talking about). This wig has long enough lace and NO bulk!! Yes she is on the stringy side and yes the nots are a little noticeable but nothing a little WIG MAGIC can't fix. She did come with 2 light (Caucasian) wig caps, which was kinda shocking because most wigs come with black or dark brown( black girl friendly) caps. She did tangle but that is to be expected from a synthetic wig but she seems to be a good buy so fare.
customer_reviews.author: HeavenlySky

customer_reviews.title: So in love with this wig
customer_reviews.text: So in love with this wig!!! It's silky soft and light weight. Usually wigs feel heavy and the ponytail looks unnatural because the hair is so thick. The only complaint I have is that the roots are cut off in quite a few spots so they spike straight out. I took a straightener to it and that helps press them down. The straightener really helped give it the look I desired. I love long straight hair 💜 definitely would purchase again. I'll have to look up the different colors available
customer_reviews.author: MomLifeBusyWife

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money!!!
customer_reviews.text: This wig is HORRIBLE. I literally reordered the same one I had before and this one is way different. There's a ton of little hairs all sticking out of the top and I can't fix them. It's so much thinner too. Dont waste your money
customer_reviews.author: Molly Joy

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as the others
customer_reviews.text: I was really excited to get this wig because I have 2 others by the same company and I love them. When the wig arrived it was perfect, lots of hair, but after wearing it out once it became tangled and unmanageable. I'm so disappointed because it looked gorgeous. I sent the wig back, but I am going to purchase another one. I'm being optimistic and hoping the new one will be better.
customer_reviews.author: Lana

customer_reviews.title: beautiful wig for cosplay
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful wig. For someone who is very skilled at customizing their wigs this could be a great everyday wig. It plucks easily and sheds amazingly little. I will be using this wig a lot but I also don't care for people to know I am wearing a wig. It is a beautiful color and easy to style. However, a couple things to note: It is heavy. Very heavy. Its full and luxurious, but heavy. It is shiny. I used almost a full can of dry shampoo and it was still just so shiny. The knots are very difficult to hide on a lighter skin tone.
customer_reviews.author: Beccah

customer_reviews.title: I like this wig a lot
customer_reviews.text: I like this wig a lot, however it needs a few adjustments. I washed it gently with a mild shampoo, let it air dry and ran som corn starch through it to take away some of the artificial looking shine. It also appears layered in the picture, but when it arrives in he mail it's not. I might layer it myself. The hairline doesn't look very natural so I usually wear it with a hat.
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: Love this wig you will too
customer_reviews.text: Love this wig! I cut like 4 -6 inches off for my preference but I love this wig! Sheds less than your own hair and the tangles are very minimal. Only major customizing that I had to do was I did some plucking of the part very minimal amount I had to take out to make it look real.I also heat styled my own curls to make it more my style nobody ever can tell it’s a wig and when they ask me where my hairdresser is and I told him a wig they stand there completely baffled gorgeous hair supersoft love it this brand is awesome
customer_reviews.author: Carol Godinho

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: The price is not amazing. You're getting what you pay for. It performs like a $30 wig. Straight out of the bag, my very first try on and the damn thing tangled. It's extremely pretty to look at and EXTREMELY annoying to wear. It tangles consistently. If you're going to buy this, plan to cut it low or wear it in a style that doesn't hang past your neck, otherwise, be prepared to have to brush it out every hour.
customer_reviews.author: Frances

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous Gray
customer_reviews.text: This piece is absolutely gorgeous !! Everyone loved this color including myself. It was nice and silky at first but after a few days it started to tangle. It straightens really well but doesn't hold heat. The best way to get curls is to use hair rollers so let them sit over night or to roller set it and then dip it in hot water.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: It's perfect!!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this wig. Wanted to give my hair a break from extensions for a while and wanted a good every day wig without spending a few hundred dollars. I would suggest using "Got 2 be Glued" around your hair line because it's a little heavy. I pull a little of my hair out to make it look more natural. It does get a little tangled but if you take care of it, it's great. I'm new to wigs and still learning but this wig is perfect. I get so many compliments and people are shocked when I tell them it's a wig!
customer_reviews.author: MandiOleson

customer_reviews.title: Amazing quality it feels great
customer_reviews.text: I love this wig it is very full and heavy and looks really realistic I took away some of the shine with some dry shampoo it’s super long and the waves are beautiful. When I wear a beanie with it people can’t even tell that it is a wig. It’s nice that it came with two wig caps. I plucked some of the hairline and the part to make it look more realistic
customer_reviews.author: Michal Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful wig for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my husband for a costume party we went to, as Willie Nelson. I also decided to wear it for a Halloween 10k race this year and got so many compliments. A lot of people asked me how I did my hair like that and told them it was a wig. It truly fooled a bunch of people. It will be used for years to come!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa K.

customer_reviews.title: the hair and wig itself are great. but the hairline is too hard and unnatural ...
customer_reviews.text: the hair and wig itself are great. but the hairline is too hard and unnatural like Halloween-y. Though I LOVE this company I bought a violet wig and it was seamlessly amazing! The hair quality of all these wig is great with some dry shampoo all sheen disappears. This wig looks great with a hat or frontal coverage maybe someone with a really dark hairline and edges to make look more natural would do well.
customer_reviews.author: FitHippy

customer_reviews.title: I love this hair a lot
customer_reviews.text: I love this hair a lot. It feels and looks real for synthetic hair save a slight sheen, but that can be taken care of with softener. The part is pretty strictly in there, but if you're creative you can part it other ways. Without heat or Bobby pins it'll revert to the normal part, though, so heads up. All in all its a good product Tangles a good amount, but with the length it's at that's under standable. Great price for a wig people think is my hair.
customer_reviews.author: Ana Luisa

customer_reviews.title: Hot momma!
customer_reviews.text: I am in love with all 22in! As soon as out of the package it was so soft and even after using a couple of times very nice party that is plucked so makes it look more natural. The price is very nice specially as it’s a great wig. Able to cut and use heat in it without ruining it! Definitely rock this wig!
customer_reviews.author: Misty Flota

customer_reviews.title: Super heavy and thick
customer_reviews.text: No idea how anyone gets this wig to look natural. It's THICK. There's so much hair and the top just looks fake. I had such high hopes but it's just too fake looking. Unless you had this cut and thinned out, and even then it still would look pretty fake. You could wear a hat and get away with it I'm sure.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: Nice wig for the price
customer_reviews.text: Loved the color. Wanted to see how it would look before I made a permanent change on my real hair. The wig was too dense, I cut out a few tracks and thinned it out. Needs work done to it for It to be a wig of everyday use.
customer_reviews.author: DJ Luv

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good for the price. It is a little shiny, but I just added a little dry shampoo and baby powder and reduced all the shine. The hair is synthetic so it does tangle a little easy, but I was able to brush it out easily and I don't have a lot of fallout. Overall, it's a fun wig!
customer_reviews.author: Daisy

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love this wig. I opted for this one after I purchased a gray/silver wig from another company and discovered that that one wasn’t lace front. So as soon as I found out that this one was lace front and it had such great reviews, I pulled the trigger. I’m so glad I did! I love this wig and get so many compliments on it. It’s so soft and versatile, and looks great however I style it.
customer_reviews.author: Whitney Wright

customer_reviews.title: ... year old daughter who wanted to wear it for fun. She ended up liking it so much that ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this wig for my 14 year old daughter who wanted to wear it for fun. She ended up liking it so much that she hasn't stopped wearing it in a month. I told her she must stop wearing it after Halloween. The only reason I didn't give it 5 stars is because after so much wear, it has got this frizziness going on. My daughter tried smoothing it out with a brush but it only helps for a few minutes. Maybe some instructions for the long term care of the wig would help. Either way this is still an awesome wig.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse Murillo

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars!
customer_reviews.text: For the price and length this wig is amazing! It came with the wig and two wig caps. It has three clips inside and it's adjustable. The wig is also super soft. I have a pretty small head and on the smallest setting fits perfectly around my head. I will definitely buy from K'ryssma again! The only thing that could make this better is if it came with a comb.
customer_reviews.author: Adrieelep

customer_reviews.title: Great First Wig
customer_reviews.text: I really like this wig! I've always liked silver hair but I was afraid of damaging my own hair with bleach. I was doing crochet braids at first but that can get too complicated (and expensive). Finally, someone suggested for me to get a wig and I came across this one. Its full length is just above my butt (I'm 5'4) and it's pretty thick. For me, the length and thickness makes it tangle easily. I'll probably cut it but other than that I really enjoy this wig. It comes with three combs, an elastic band, has a lace front, and two wig caps. It's my first wig so I'm still figuring out how to style it.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: Soft and not too fake to the touch
customer_reviews.text: First wig I ever bought so not great at wearing it yet. Gotta mess around with the wig cap... lace front... scalp... hairline... need to watch A TON more YouTube videos... But hey, throw a beanie on it and you’re good to go! Just hope it doesn’t get hot nor do you sweat! All in all, a pretty nice quality wig (not that I’ve had much experience in what’s good/bad). Shedding wise... if real hair sheds... wigs could shed too...? If you want to see what you’ll look like with a certain hair color before committing $$$ to permanent changes or just to shake things up, this wig is definitely worth it and fun!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful but tangles easily
customer_reviews.text: So easy to style but does tangle Very easily, that's the only thing that sucks, but it's beautiful and heavy. I can put it up into buns or do whatever and it moves well. I like the side part too. It sheds quite a bit but after brushing through once it toned down. Everyone’s favorite at work. Definitely makes a statement.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: Minimal shedding- so many compliments!
customer_reviews.text: This is the third wig I have bought from them and the longest. I absolutely love it. First comb out maybe had 5 strands shed and that’s really been it! The wig is dense enough to be realistic and not thin by any means. It is heat resistant- I have only straightened out a few sections since I loved the style it came with out of the bag. I can also say that I get so many compliments about it! Plus I got it super quick! I was so surprised by how fast I got it!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Rodgers

customer_reviews.title: Was extra skeptical about ordering weave online but it turned out great! it's really really really long but it looks ...
customer_reviews.text: loveeeeee this wig . Was extra skeptical about ordering weave online but it turned out great ! it's really really really long but it looks just like the product photo . Really soft ! I wasn't too much of a fan of the part so I put curls in the hide that 😅 . I didn't use heat ! So I don't know if you can or can not .
customer_reviews.author: Adrienne B.

customer_reviews.title: Why is this wig soo damn good
customer_reviews.text: I'm shook with this wig, she's lovely, don't get me wrong it's not perfect and the hair can look a little like plasticy when understyled, you have to style it through out the day so that it looks always sharp but it's bomb for that price, I can't even it's just adorable, perfect go to the groceries day time wig. It sheds a little but it's ok. It really makes me feel the fantasy.
customer_reviews.author: Ana Campos

customer_reviews.title: Looks so real
customer_reviews.text: So I went in to get a long bob for our family Christmas photos instead they over chopped my hair and left me looking like lord faquaad from shrek. After crying my eyes out for the rest of the day I searched up wigs on YouTube and came across this wig, purchased it and I couldn’t be any happier, my family literally thought it was my actual hair with matching extensions. Looked so real!
customer_reviews.author: Cupycake23

customer_reviews.title: I love this wig
customer_reviews.text: I love this wig. It's soft and boucy. It's not heavy and perfect amount of thickness for me. I never thought silver would look good but I absolutely love this and am going to wear it to work! Pics of before cutting lace and then after I cut lace, styled and added foundation to the hairline/splitline.
customer_reviews.author: Erika

customer_reviews.title: Black on gray
customer_reviews.text: My first wig. Beautiful Gray color. Love the length of it. I actually trimmed it down. The roots are DARK BLACK. It's hard for me to get used to how dark those roots are on me. The hair is split right at the center and laid to the sides. I can't force it to do a side split and lay right. But it is my first and I'm sure I will learn in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Stephinae Morales

customer_reviews.title: Don't think twice!!!
customer_reviews.text: When I saw this, I was skeptical as I usually pay almost double for lace front like these. But I was pleasantly surprised! Not only did it arrive super fast, it was exactly like the picture, soft, and (because I wanted mine to frame my face more) very easy to cut and style. It's a little shiny, but nothing dry shampoo didn't immediately fix. I cannot recommend this enough!
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Overall a great wig
customer_reviews.text: Wig was as pictured. Came with 2 wig caps (like a nylon pantyhose) The wig shed a lot for a minute but after you get all the loose hair out it's good. It does get a bit itchy at the hairline because of the lace but I also didn't tape/glue it down. So that might make a difference because the lace won't be rubbing against my head. I wish it was easier changing the part since i dont wear my hair down the middle. Looks very cute, but don't get too close. You'll deffinantly be able to tell it's a wig, so I wear a headband
customer_reviews.author: Rachael

customer_reviews.title: Great buy I recommend to purchase
customer_reviews.text: This is my first wig ever. I loved it..it’s soft you can brush it & it doesn’t have a lot of fall out or any so far. I haven’t used any heat on it. It’s a little heavy super thick but aside from that The ajustable inside is amazing. It can look like your natural hair if you style it right, plus it’s easy to do different hair style & it not look fake. A couple of people even thought I had put in extensions. So I would recommend ppl to buy it & the price makes it even more better
customer_reviews.author: Aracely garcia

customer_reviews.title: Stunning for the price!
customer_reviews.text: This wig is gorgeous! It’s so full and thick, but a heads up...If you’re going simply for cosplay it’s fine; If you’re going for a more natural looking hairline, it needs a LOT of plucking! The lace front doesn’t seem to be as long as pictured but it’s workable for sure. Simply put: Beautiful for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Unit!
customer_reviews.text: Love this wig!! The hair cut/style is really cute! You have to trim baby hairs which is super quick and easy. I secured the wig with Got2B Glued hair gel and it stayed on all night out even with sweat. I love the wigs come with two hair caps! Amazing quality! Came with a little shine to it but with a little dry shampoo it looks perfect!! I received many compliments!
customer_reviews.author: Brook Baker

customer_reviews.title: Even the police thought it was real. But
customer_reviews.text: My very first lace front wig! I had it for a year before I moved on to others but I was in love with it! A lot of people said it looked real. The most convincing thing I can say honestly is I went to jail in this wig and the officer’s were convinced.
customer_reviews.author: Grace

customer_reviews.title: Great wig!
customer_reviews.text: This is my first wig. It was a bold choice, but I love it. Everyone thinks it is real, which is awesome! Take a look at the pictures. It does get tangled. And right now it is really dry and tangled 😞 But I'm still trying to figure wigs out, I'll just have to get it washed. It came with 2 wig caps. Seriously in love. I would love to sponsor!!! Wink wink haha
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exactly like picture
customer_reviews.text: The wig came and I was skeptical since it’s synthetic, but it looks just like the pictures and actually really soft. It does tangle though really easy and it’s hard to untangle gently. The ends could start to look ragged after a full night wear without combing through and braiding it up.
customer_reviews.author: Tyra S

customer_reviews.title: Good for price
customer_reviews.text: I like this wig, but I don't think it's for everyday wear. It's good looking for a cheap wig, and definitely photographs better than it looks in person. Not saying that it looks bad in person, it's just more obvious that it's a wig. Maybe if it's styled half up half down or something along those lines it'll look a little bit more natural. I find that this is an issue with most inexpensive long wigs because the back never quite lays right and all the hair tends to flow forward on either side.
customer_reviews.author: LifeOnLongIsland

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: The hair is nice for the first two times you wear it, then after that it’s kind of downhill from there. It’s nothing but a knotted mess. The part is awkward. Brushing it makes it worse. For the price it’s not worth it at all. I wear clip on extensions, own human hair wigs, and have used synthetic wigs. If the hair wasn’t so long it probably wouldn’t of been so bad. But it’s long, and gets into a huge mess on the back of your head. Can easily tell it’s wig.
customer_reviews.author: Jaz

customer_reviews.title: Pretty unhappy.
customer_reviews.text: I was extremely excited to receive this since it was my first time purchasing a lace front wig and the style plus the color looked amazing, and for the first 1-2 weeks or so, it was. But after a bit, and combing it with a wide tooth comb, it started to get tangled super easy. After an hour of just walking around and wearing it, it would cause it to become very tangled and when it came to combing it, I could never get it fully tangle-free. Now it's become all frizzy and the texture is not the same anymore.
customer_reviews.author: corridor

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this wig
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this wig! Very real looking, I’d recommend adding a little dry shampoo or baby powder to help with the shine, also a hat or heatband isn’t a bad idea to help with the part. All around for the price the quality and look is unbeatable! It does get super tangled which is kinda unavoidable so just be careful when wearing cause combing it out is not easy. (Note: last photo was taken right after it came in the mail and I hadn’t trimmed off the mesh netting yet so you can see it across my forehead, just take a pair of scissors and trim to liking)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is a great wig. I had to cut off the lace ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great wig. I had to cut off the lace in front and it looks super realistic; people have thought it was real and I tricked my mom into thinking that I had gotten hair extensions LOL. Giving it 4 stars since I had to cut the lace. Not bad on shedding and isn’t glossy. I love it and so does my boyfriend; in his words: “I feel like I’m cheating” HAHA enjoy!
customer_reviews.author: McKenzie

customer_reviews.title: Not Ombre
customer_reviews.text: The wig is great quality, but the roots are like 4" long. It is not ombre and looks a little crazy. I dyed it all dark. Still a good wig!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Estrada

customer_reviews.title: Okay enough
customer_reviews.text: Color was far too dark for me. Very noticeable knots. Seemed like it would tangle easily. Okay enough for how cheap it is. Just don't expect a miracle.
customer_reviews.author: sweet7reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Super soft, adorable, easy to wear, not itchy, and looks natural! I get so many compliments when I wear this brands wigs. I have at least 13. Love them all!!! Even without a hat people have no idea!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda lynn

customer_reviews.title: which was excellent. The quality is very nice
customer_reviews.text: Shipped VERT fast, which was excellent. The quality is very nice, the wig construction is amazing, the hair is soft and even though it's straight it doesn't tangle. Also it has beautiful density. The cons however are that the black top is way too shiny and plastic looking, the gray hair is beautiful though. Also the cap is quite small, however I do have a sort of big head, it fits me more as a half wig, but still wearable. I would definitely order another one.
customer_reviews.author: M. Mora

customer_reviews.title: Wicked Awesome Wig
customer_reviews.text: I have never written a review on Amazon before but felt compelled to because this wig was just stunning. I had been looking for realistic, thick wig for a good price. All of the wigs I was looking at fell into the 100+ range. I took a chance on this wig and it just blew me away. Seriously epic and for this price I was just stunned! Will buy more of these in the future. Packed neatly, with a wig cap and the wig itself is soft luscious and just incredible. This my first ever lace front wig and I didn't exactly know what to expect. The wig is super comfortable and the color is just lovely.
customer_reviews.author: Gabby

customer_reviews.title: Not bad, but not Great!
customer_reviews.text: This wig is very soft and beautifully styled and came in a bag perfect for travel with two wig caps! The dark roots don’t look very natural and don’t balayage with the silver very well, but if you’re just looking for a fun wig or are willing to pluck the hairline and bleach the knots this wig is beautiful otherwise and worth the money :)
customer_reviews.author: Gracie B

customer_reviews.title: The wig is super heavy and does not look real
customer_reviews.text: The wig is super heavy and does not look real. It could work for pics but I wouldn’t wear in public or in light lol. I cut mine to take off the weight. But it still didn’t fit well and itched. The hair also tangled easily. I will say it’s true to the picture and what you see is what you get.
customer_reviews.author: Shelley Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: Soft hair and lots of it
customer_reviews.text: I've taken a liking to wigs as I use them a lot for cosplay and bought this one for fun and because it looked gorgeous in the photo. When I got it, I didn't like it at first, but I pulled it out to use it for a goblin masquerade ball and ended up falling in love with it again. Since the photos, I've sprayed it lightly with hairspray to make it a bit less fuzzy.
customer_reviews.author: Keya

customer_reviews.title: Workable
customer_reviews.text: This wig is beautiful! However, be prepared for a lot of plucking in the hairline and dry shampoo to make the hair less shiny. In these photos it looks really real but in real life it’s very obviously fake because of how shiny it is and the hairline is way too thick. But if you wanna put in the work, it’s cute.
customer_reviews.author: Bethany Rose

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't hold heated curls
customer_reviews.text: Loved mostly everything about this wig! The lace is almost transparent, the hair is soft and doesn't shed, haws great body, can wash, dry, and flat iron BUT it cannot hold a HEATED CURL. You have to use rollers to get the curl back. But other than that, the wig lasted me about 3 years. Def worth the buy!
customer_reviews.author: zenobia

customer_reviews.title: Good wig for the price.
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic wig for the price. There's a lot of hair amd its very soft without being overly shiny. It does tangle easy since its sythetic. I also wasnt a huge fan of the way the hair looked where it's attached to the lace but thats easy to fix with a little powder.
customer_reviews.author: cheyenne callaway

customer_reviews.title: My favorite wig
customer_reviews.text: This was the first wig I ever bought and I love it. I’m on my second one now and I’ll always own one of these wigs. The hair is thick and natural looking but not too heavy on your head. It also doesn’t have that unnatural shine that a lot of synthetic wigs have. I get a ton of compliments on the color. Super good value for the price. Just take good care of it and it’ll last you a long time
customer_reviews.author: Ciarra Crago

customer_reviews.title: What wig?
customer_reviews.text: Love this wig! It is so amazing. It isn't soft, but it isn't supposed to be. I attempted to curl it and failed miserably. It was perfect. I have gotten so so many compliments in it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Straight out of the package it definitely needs some work (plucking some hairs at the hair line, shearing of the hair framing the face and I had to flat iron and thin out a little bump at the top though it was probably just from the packaging) Overall, it looks good. The hair feels soft and looks real and the wig is a comfortable piece. I find you get what you pay for and a lot more with this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Like it!
customer_reviews.text: The wig was as pictured which is always nice to see! The hair is soft and natural looking. I styled it with a side part and cut a lot off the bottom. I got tons of compliments, people didn't realize it was a wig at all!! Only complaints are the wig cap, which runs pretty big and it sheds a little more than i'd like but otherwise, great deal! Will buy again!
customer_reviews.author: rosesRred

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic wig!
customer_reviews.text: Great wig overall. This makes wig number 47 for me and I will admit I had to do a bit of work on it. It's super long and thick but because of that it tangles easy. I had to pluck the hairline to make it look more natrual and color the lace so it matches my skin tone. Also it has one random clip in the middle of the wig, I just moved it to the back for more support. I got lots of compliments at Otakon for my Casual Storm cosplay (that's what the wig was used for) and honestly I'd buy from the seller again now that I know what needs to be done to fit my standards.
customer_reviews.author: Shanice Lewis

customer_reviews.title: A new look
customer_reviews.text: This wig is absolutely gorgeous. Very soft and silky. Fits head area snugly without pinching. The shades out darker to lighter looks so natural. Easy to maintain.
customer_reviews.author: Audre H

customer_reviews.title: Must Buy!
customer_reviews.text: This is my third wig from this company and as usual it’s a perfect purchase. Lots of compliments, hardly sheds, soft, not shiny, and extremely full in volume. The wig is completely simple to style and all around is gorgeous. This is a must buy for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Krissy

customer_reviews.title: Yes! Would buy again!!
customer_reviews.text: Skeptical but thought the price was good enough to try it out. Pleasantly surprised!! Looked great, but like most wigs, can tangle a little when outdoors. Definitely make sure to brush and keep well. Also, I ended up youtubing some tips tricks to take away some shine to be a little more natural, although it was great quality out of bag!
customer_reviews.author: Elle

customer_reviews.title: Tangles easily, still cute though
customer_reviews.text: I like it a lot!!! I get a lot of compliments. Only complaints are: it gets tangled frequently (and easily!!!), so expect lots of brushing. it's quite frizzy when it's tangled, causing it to look wiggy. Also, the part is not natural looking at all. I usually put some concealer on it. But what can I say? I got what I paid for. I still love it! I would not recommend for daily use if you're gonna wear it down. I wear it almost every day, but I wear it in a single braid most of the time.
customer_reviews.author: TheGreatCornholio

customer_reviews.title: BEAUTIFUL!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This week is SO PRETTY. I didn’t pull bangs through like I normally would but man it looks good! ABSOLUTELY a great wig for an amazing price. Also it is DEFINITELY grey but photos made it look way more blonde than it is in real life haha
customer_reviews.author: Scotti Wilkerson

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: This wig looks amazing!! It seriously looks natural. It does tangle a little bit, but no more than natural long hair tangles. Excellent and very beautiful! I would buy again in a heartbeat! If you want the grey hair look but don't want to damage your natural hair, do it. This option is so much cheaper and safer for your hair. :)
customer_reviews.author: Dawgfan

customer_reviews.title: Practice wig
customer_reviews.text: Pros: cheap, a lot of hair/ really thick, color as described. Cons: TANGLES very easily, looks really fake/ halloweenish, takes a lot of plucking/ thinning out at hairline to make it look real. Overall: it’s a good wig for a first time buyer or beginner. Still trying to find a way so that the hair doesn’t tangle so easily. Had to spend about an hour creating baby hairs so the hair line looked natural. Some short hairs in the back.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Couldn’t quite make it work
customer_reviews.text: It’s a cheap synthetic wig, and looks like a good quality but cheap synthetic wig. I plucked and added wig powder and did everything I could think of, but bottom line it just does not look natural. I think if you were a medium to deep skin tone it could work, but on my pastey butt if just looked laughably fake. When it says “minimum tangle”, I think that holds up- tangles happen but are easily fixed and never matted. Shipping was also late, which is a consistent review I have seen for this piece.
customer_reviews.author: Sam P

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful wig! I've started buying wigs because I have a super short (almost buzz) pixie to let my natural hair heal, and this one is my new favorite. The lace (and a tad of concealer) makes for a natural part. Yesterday I went out running errands and I got a compliment each place I went (all thinking it was my actual hair!). I did trim the "bangs" a bit to help it frame my face. I would definitely recommend this to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Lu

customer_reviews.title: Love this wig it looks super natural and barely feels ...
customer_reviews.text: Love this wig it looks super natural and barely feels synthetic I cut some layers around the face and put concealer with setting powder on the part . I did move the part over and if u do this I reccomend you have someone else wear it for the process . I also put some dry shampoo but it really didn’t need it . I wore it to a baseball game and got so many compliments on it and everyone thought it was real
customer_reviews.author: lauren

customer_reviews.title: Being able to have one wig for multiple occasions.
customer_reviews.text: This wig is so beautiful and light. It’s very easy to make different looks with it ! I’ve been a Oc Cosplay for 2 years now, being able to make multiple looks for one wig is just amazing! I’ve already made 2 Oc cosplay characters with is wig. I even wear this wig on my anniversary night. It became one of my favorite wigs in the short time that I’ve had it.
customer_reviews.author: saya zaya acevedo

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice, but easily gets holes
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this wig. Right out of the bag it really seemed like a quality produce. It does however get holes in the lace very easily. Be careful when removing strands of hair to make it look more realistic. Otherwise, it's a great product for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: It’s a beautiful wig
customer_reviews.text: The wig is pretty but the hair line is not that great I am not sure if it’s the because it’s so black but I just doesn’t suite me at all
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Sabrina Says Yes!
customer_reviews.text: I could rave about this wig until I die! I love switching up my hair and this hair is bold and beautiful! Truly one of the most luxurious synthetic units I’ve ever purchased! Product Approved! :)
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina Says Yes!

customer_reviews.title: Not the best wig out there
customer_reviews.text: For the price, it is not that bad but if you want to brush it or change the hairstyle the hair will start falling out pretty quickly. It feels like straight-up plastic but you only realize that if once you touch it so from far or in pictures it seems like it could maybe be real.
customer_reviews.author: Alejandra Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Does not sit right....
customer_reviews.text: Wig hair was not bad for not being 100% human hair. The color is like in the picture and great layers... however it is important for a wig to sit right on the head. When i made the wig sit even on my head the parted area was uneven with the lace front and the clips inside were put on randomly.
customer_reviews.author: Sami Moheb

customer_reviews.title: Interesting Wig
customer_reviews.text: This hair is very hard to maintain after a few wears just because it tangled and is thick. The lace is thick and scratchy and difficult to work with but This hair is definitely is an eye-catcher though. I got a lot of compliments on this hair and I think next time, I will cut the hair drastically to have good wear.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love it!! It’s so much fun, and pretty and soft. This is my first experience with a wig, so can’t make a comparison, but it’s just what I wanted and I love it!
customer_reviews.author: PCasa

customer_reviews.title: Affordable and pretty
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice first wig experience for me, and affordable which made me happy that I was satisfied with those two things. I feel cute and confident wearing it. The only thing is the wig sutures inside are a slight small for my big head lol but definitely try this wig if you're a beginner like myself. I wish it wouldn't tangle so fast but its synthetic so I cant complain too much
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: Perfect first time wig.
customer_reviews.text: Love the color, style and length. Came professionally packaged with a free wig cap. So far been wearing it for 2days (slept in it) and still has not tangled nor shed. I will be buying more colors. Did self instal, but does need plucking.
customer_reviews.author: Aurora Borealis

customer_reviews.title: It's honestly fantastic for such a cheap lace front
customer_reviews.text: I was not expecting this to be so full and long. It's honestly fantastic for such a cheap lace front. I love it. My family loves it. My friends love it. Will definitely order from here again.
customer_reviews.author: Adrianne Jade

customer_reviews.title: This wig is great, soft and the color is as listed.
customer_reviews.text: I have bought several wigs from this Brand, I find that generally they as very nice, well made, soft and do not tangle much. This seller was fast shipment with no issues.
customer_reviews.author: NEH

customer_reviews.title: Sewn bad
customer_reviews.text: Only thing I like about it was the color and how much hair it had. But the cap inside was sewn bad, it’s not even centered. The part that should be in the back is actually to the side and the lace part is just to much to one side. It just does not match up when you put it on your head !!
customer_reviews.author: Lehuanani Wong

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I love this wig. My first time buying it and took a risk based off the other reviews. I love it! Got alot of compliments. I wish this was my real hair! Only thing is it does get tangled alil but that's expected with synthetic hair and as far as shedding,2 strands came out from combing. Must say ,im impressed!
customer_reviews.author: Chiniqua

customer_reviews.title: Sorry not for me
customer_reviews.text: In my opinion it feels too much like a Halloween wig
customer_reviews.author: JesseDe

customer_reviews.title: Underwhelming
customer_reviews.text: This wig has awkward roots, SUPER DARK knots, and looked overall unrealistic. Not a fan.
customer_reviews.author: Dylan

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE LOVE
customer_reviews.text: K'ryssma NEVER fails!! I adore the wig & the color is amazing! Totally completed this look AND will definitely be used again! Got so many compliments on it!!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Morse

customer_reviews.title: Great Wig!
customer_reviews.text: I love love love LOVE this wig!!! I was a little hesitant to buy a wig off amazon but a YouTuber named itsmyrayeraye convinced me, and I’m soo glad she did! This wig is worth every penny, and it’s pretty lightweight too. My only concern was that it seems to tangle easy but that’s no big deal, it’s fixable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: very dark so I would only recommend for natural brunettes
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous color. The roots are very, very dark so I would only recommend for natural brunettes. The grey ombre is gorgeous. The hair is quite long and does tangle a bit, but i found the more I run my straightener through it, the softer the hair becomes and the less it tangles.
customer_reviews.author: Meggie

customer_reviews.title: Not sure if I will ever pull it off but it's nice in pictures
customer_reviews.text: It's my first front lace wig so I'm still trying to learn the tricks to make it look real. Not sure if I will ever pull it off but it's nice in pictures. Texture is good. Curls & waves stayed even after several comb session. No weird smell & no complaints
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: She cute or wuteva
customer_reviews.text: This lady was long af, I had to give her a trim, and she heavy too. I love her though. She gets tangled and ratty real quick, but she's of decent quality for the price. Not the biggest fan of the parting, the caps is a tad bit large, however I always get compliments when I wear her.
customer_reviews.author: Autumn Hash

product_meta.title: K'ryssma Black Lace Front Wig Long Natural Straight Synthetic Wigs For Women Heat Resistant Replacement Hair Wigs 22 inches
feature_bullets: Basic Info of Black Lace Front Wig: 22 inches Long Natural Straight Lace Front Wigs (Kind Reminder: Slightly Color Difference between Different Monitors)
Long Lace Front Wig Cap Structure: Synthetic Lace Front Wig with 13x4" Lace Size, 22.5" Average Wig Cap Size, 2 Adjustable Straps and 3 Combs inside
Lace Front Synthetic Wig Advantage: High Quality, Soft Hair Wig with Natural Hairline, 150% High Density Makes the Wig Full and Avoids the Wefts Showing
Black Long Lace Front Wig Features: Black Synthetic Wig Could Be Heated within 320F, When Heated, Please Run Through the Hair Quick in Case of Damage the Hair
Package Included: 1x K'ryssma Long Straight Black Synthetic Lace Front Wig + 2 pcs x Stretchable Elastic Nylon Best Wig Caps by K'ryssma
